entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wynyard 7:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -31.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -34.8°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
